page.title: 04Transport Traffic Count
page.content:
We all went out to the school gate and counted the passing traffic.We watched from 1:35 p.m. to 2:05 p.m. on 24.4.85
Cars Buses Lorries Vans Motor Bikes Bikes { 20 1 2 7 1 1
We asked 42 families how they travel. How do you travel to Alnwick? 25 by car.12 by bus.5 by bus or car. How do you travel to work? 17 by car. 18 by bus.1 by motorbike.3 walk.3 do not work. How do you travel on holiday? 27 by car.8 by bus.Train-car 3.Car-aeroplane 3.No holidays 1. Do you have a car? Yes 33 No 9 Are you happy with the bus service to Alnwick? Yes 28 No 11 Do not use bus 3
